description: Patrol the perimeter of the specified area at an altitude of 76 meters, searching for drones.

waypoints.description: Take off from the center of the operation area.
Navigate to the southwest corner of the operation area.
Patrol the southern boundary of the operation area.
Patrol the eastern boundary of the operation area.
Patrol the northern boundary of the operation area.
Patrol the western boundary of the operation area.
Land back at the center of the operation area.

safety_considerations: Maintain a safe distance from other drones.
Ensure the drone remains within the operation area.
success_criteria: Successfully patrol the entire perimeter of the operation area.
Identify any drones within the operation area.
Return to the center of the operation area safely.
original_command: haz un recorrido del perimetro a unos 76 metros buscando drones en el camino
